mapper.insert: insert into patient (pid, pname, pgender, page, pbirth, paddress, state) values (#{pid}, #{pname}, #{pgender}, #{page}, #{pbirth}, #{paddress}, #{state})
mapper.select: select count(*) from patient where pid = #{id}

select p.pid as pid, pname, pgender, page, pbirth, paddress, state from register r join userrdept ud on r.uRid = ud.uRid join user u on u.userid = ud.userid join patient p on p.pid = r.pid where u.userid = #{userid} and p.state = #{state} and TO_DAYS(r.date) = TO_DAYS(now())

select p.pid as pid, pname, pgender, page, pbirth, paddress, state from register r join userrdept ud on r.uRid = ud.uRid join dept d on d.deptcode = ud.deptcode join patient p on p.pid = r.pid where d.deptcode = #{deptcode} and p.state = #{state} and TO_DAYS(r.date) = TO_DAYS(now())
